item.title: Page 45 - Should I? ... You already have
item.description:
Page 45 - Should I? ... You already have

Another way to think about it is whenever you are in the midst of making a choice among two or more options, then realize that there are parallel universes for each option you are seriously considering. All of these universes are connect to ... 2015-0813Su 1520 SOMA SF Sorry!

item.title: Page 44 - Answer (spoiler alert)
item.description:
Page 44 - Answer (spoiler alert)

The purpose of the quantum sensing the past experiment is to realize that there are many pasts and each one you can sense does exist. There are universes where I had no drinks that night and universes where I had more drinks that I could count.

item.title: Page 50 - Traditions synchronize Universes
item.description:
Page 50 - Traditions synchronize Universes

If you enjoy something, repeat it. If you want it to be part of your experienced life in the future, repeat it more - make it a tradition! Doing so greatly increase the probability of the repeated event being experienced by you in the future. Almost a year ago, Carmel (who gave me this blank...

item.title: Page 48 - Be aware of parallel universes discovered
item.description:
Page 48 - Be aware of parallel universes discovered

For the next 24 hours, be especially aware of the new parallel universes you discovered in the last exercise - and if you didn't complete the exercise, now may be a good time to do so - or maybe not - you decide ;). As you go through your day, pay attention to unexpected events....

item.title: Page 49 - Make choices aligned with your desired universes
item.description:
Page 49 - Make choices aligned with your desired universes

If you can make a single choice to get to a Universe you want AND you can muster up the free will energy required to make that choice, then do it! Often there are other factors involved, including the free will choices others may make. Look for opportunities where you can make choices that are...

item.title: Page 47 - Exercise - Create/Discover some Universes
item.description:
Page 47 - Exercise - Create/Discover some Universes

Find the "Should I ..." question that I asked you to think about. Think about the universes where you do and the universes where you don't do whatever you are considering. Consider the "do it" universes. Write down a few things you dislike about the "do it" universes when compared to the "don't do it"...

item.title: Page 46 - Use Free Will to Create Universes
item.description:
Page 46 - Use Free Will to Create Universes

Universes exist as probabilities. You can create possible universes by making choices - by using free will. The harder the choice, i.e. the more free will required, the more effect you have on the probabilities of the universes around you. 2015-0920Su 0840 Zilker Park Free will is the source of power used to move through...

item.title: Page 54 - Birth in a Multiverse
item.description:
Page 54 - Birth in a Multiverse

Fifty years ago today I was born in a small town in Texas. About nine months before that I was conceived. The genetic makeup of my physical body that I know as my own was determined by one in over 100 million of my father's sperm cells in the ejaculation that led to my birth....

item.title: Page 53 - Connect with People
item.description:
Page 53 - Connect with People

Each time you connect with someone, you become aware of new possible futures. Even if you don't stay in touch, you can be certain that one of your parallel selves is staying in touch. This connection will continue to have an effect on your even if you choose to remain in the set of universes...

item.title: Page 57 - Life in the Multiverse
item.description:
Page 57 - Life in the Multiverse

For my birthday I "planned" an unplanned day guided by the intention to not do anything that I wouldn't enjoy repeating every day for the rest of my life. My experience was different than my intention, but close to it. I'm certain that my quantum self did manage to meet this intention in a good...
